alfredsnippet.snippet:
"It has been well-demonstrated for instance, by Bondi and others, that all the salient consequences of Einstein's notorious 'Theory of Relativity' can be deduced much more simply and efficiently from commonsense premises without any mention of the nonsensical 'speed of light in vacuo' and its paradoxical and brain-racking 'EPR' implications ..."

(cont'd)
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Speed of Light in a Vacuum - Part 1
